metadata.title: Thursday, 21st September, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why there is uncollected garbage in towns and cities, countrywide;
(b) whether the Keep Zambia Clean and Healthy Campaign has been achieving its intended purpose;
(c) what short and long term measures are being taken to enhance garbage collection and keep the towns and cities clean; and
(d) when the measures at (c) will be implemented.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade Natuseko Health Centre in Kabwe District to a first level hospital;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) how many dams were operational in Msanzala Parliamentary Constituency, as of April, 2023;
(b) how many dams were not operational;
(c) when the dams at (b) will be rehabilitated;
(d) whether the Government has any plans to construct more dams in the Constituency;
(e) if so, how many dams are earmarked for construction;
(f) what the cost of constructing the new dams is; and
(g) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) how many districts, countrywide, did not have a boarding secondary school, as of August, 2023;
(b) whether the Government has any plans to construct boarding secondary schools in the affected districts;
(c) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks –His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) - Resumption of Debate: (MrKalobo, MP) . ___________________________
